title: Watch: Two Men Came To The Rescue Of A Puppy Who Got Stuck In A Canal & Couldn't Come Out!
text:
Watch: Two Men Came To The Rescue Of A Puppy Who Got Stuck In A Canal & Couldn't Come Out!

Watch: Two Men Came To The Rescue Of A Puppy Who Got Stuck In A Canal & Couldn't Come Out!

Every day, we read about incidents of rape and murder, which drain our faith in humanity. But, it only takes one news of someone doing something good and positive, to lift our spirits and give us some hope.

Recently, a puppy fell into a deep canal in China and was not able to get out of it. It desperately kept trying to get out, but nothing worked. That's when two good Samaritans attempted to rescue the puppy. They leaned down in the water and tried to pull the puppy out; it didn’t work. But, the men did not give up and kept trying. After trying for a while, they finally succeeded in pulling the little one out of the canal.

The video of the incident also went viral on social media. Here’s the video:

It was shared by the People's Daily, China, on Twitter. The video garnered over 30.7 k views, 1.2 k likes and many comments lauding the men.

Recently, Nepal also celebrated Diwali and there, Diwali is called Tihar. There too, the place is lit with lamps and people celebrate the triumph of light over darkness. In Nepalese Hinduism, the second day of the five-day festival is known as Kukar Tihar, and it is dedicated to worshipping dogs.

On this day, the role of dogs in human life throughout history, is celebrated. In Hindu mythology, a dog is considered to guard the gates of afterlife. Even if you keep the tradition aside, we know from experience that having dogs as pets and companions is one of the most fulfilling things ever.

They are loyal, sensitive to our emotions and only expect affection and love in return. For all this and much more, they deserve a day in the year especially dedicated to them.
